# Fill Screen for Plex
 	
A browser extension that zooms the video in to make it cover the entire screen and remove black bars without stretching on Plex.


1. Go to Plex
2. Play a video
3. Click the extension / Click extension again to disable.



![before](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/34684219/363465626-65c9f719-2455-4c06-a571-4cab09ef8c0a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..p3-i--uAdbff2MGqadhyQqfaWy8XSh1CDdBH3kwI5Ps)
![after](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/34684219/363465630-ec0057c2-ab82-44de-8155-1c1c851bf2c8.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..169yraKP9ij4Rai5tW--saUU2HCZrtq-RUO7Wg3-iXo)
